analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x918a1b57f6837b1d7ec682501dd21b060e85c1a9.sol:
	Contract AMLToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x918a1b57f6837b1d7ec682501dd21b060e85c1a9.sol#232)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0x918a1b57f6837b1d7ec682501dd21b060e85c1a9.sol#102-103) is not in mixedCase
